mapper.insert: insert into competitorrecord( competitionId, competitorId, ranking, teamOrNot ) values( #{competitionId}, #{competitorId}, #{ranking}, #{teamOrNot})
mapper.select: select * from competitorrecord WHERE competitorId = #{competitorId} ORDER BY ranking ASC LIMIT 10
mapper.update: UPDATE competitorrecord set rankPercent = #{rankPercent} WHERE competitorId = #{competitorId} and competitionId = #{competitionId}
mapper.select: select DISTINCT competitorId from competitorrecord WHERE teamOrNot = 1
